title: March 2025 livestreams
html_content:

Jesus Christ Chan - Sonic 2006 Speed Run

‚Äú Thank you for the money! Been a while! ‚Äù
Chris
‚Äú They don't make this easy for speedrunners... ‚Äù
Chris

Jesus Christ Chan - Sonic 2006 Speed Run is a livestream done by Chris on 14 March 2025, in which he plays through the 2006 Sonic the Hedgehog game, widely regarded as one of the worst Sonic games ever made. Chris teased this livestream about a week prior on 6 March,[1] and announced it would happen later the same day on 14 March.[2] Chris also mentioned that he thinks his "speed play" could take more than one stream to complete. About three hours before streaming, Chris published a YouTube video of himself reading Chaos Crystal Control Act 0 as a "precursor to the livestream that will be coming later."[3]

Chris mentions that "perhaps another time [he] could definitely do ... another Q&A session" via livestream, as long as he receives "genuine thoughts and questions" that are not "mean-spirited or MoistCr1TiKaL."

Good old-fashioned PS3 fun!

Description

Highlights

Highlights
  • 02:42: [Stream begins]
  • 02:59: Chris says he learned a stream tip from vtuber Korone
  • 03:15: Chris shows the streaming room
  • 03:40: Chris claims he's having a "good time here and there. Learning new things, experiencing lots more" for his absence
  • 04:01: A user donates and asks about the incest and Chris says that it never happened, thanks the user for the five bucks, and says that they will not be reading any more hateful things.
  • 5:16: Chris asks people to donate, and says "could use a few extra bucks, but doing okay"
  • 6:49: Chris talks about his replacement classic shirt and how he is looking into a better replacement
  • 19:33: Chris says that he is not a fan of the CWC Adult Chronicles fan game, and it is "not accurate"
  • 1:17:07: A superchat ask if Chris would rather have 1 million dollars or have dinner with Sonic. Chris chose the later.
  • 1:32:34: Chris says it has been at least weeks since he has had McDonalds.
  • 2:57:11: Chris says more stuff will be added to the Etsy store and "I do get the funds"
  • 2:57:36: [Stream ends].

Transcript

¬†This media needs a transcript. Help CWCki by transcribing the content. If the media is too long, transcribe select portions which are funny or informative.

Jesus Christ Chan - Sonic 2006 Speed Playthrough

‚Äú At some times I feel like I'm better off just doing individual videos, as opposed to livestreams... ‚Äù
Chris
‚Äú I tried bouncing on it, that does not work! ‚Äù
Chris

Jesus Christ Chan - Sonic 2006 Speed Playthrough is a livestream done by Chris on 29 March 2025, in which he plays through the 2006 Sonic the Hedgehog game. Chris announced this livestream a day prior, mentioning how he aims to finally do the "second half" of Sonic's Story[4] (later adding that he will "maybe" complete it[5]). He also mentioned how he wants to be "a bit more fair in audience acknowledgment," meaning he has to "give the Superchat supporters more quick responses."

Chris is also using his dental situation from four months ago as an excuse to beg for donations.[6] At the end of the three hour stream, Chris promised to play more in a future stream, and said "a few videos" are "coming in the following weeks."

Chris after fixing the echo on his mic.
